titles.title: Congratulating the University of Mount Union football team for winning the 2015 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division III Football Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Congratulates the University of Mount Union Purple Raiders football team for winning the 2015 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division III Football Championship.
